possible_conditions.name: Diarrhea (Atisara)
possible_conditions.description: Frequent loose or watery stools due to digestive system irritation
possible_conditions.ayurvedic_perspective: Pitta causing heat and inflammation in digestive tract, with Vata creating irregular movement

immediate_actions: Drink plenty of fluids (ORS, coconut water, rice water)
Eat BRAT diet (Banana, Rice, Applesauce, Toast)
recommendations.when_to_consult_doctor: If diarrhea persists for more than 2 days, shows blood or mucus, or causes severe dehydration

dosha_imbalance.description: Pitta causing heat and inflammation in digestive tract, with Vata creating irregular movement
